Package edu.jhu.cs.pl.group18.CurseOfMalphamondModel.Action

This package implements all the actions that a tile can take

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Action
    This interface will be implemented by all kinds of actions.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    DealNumDamageToActorAction
    The action to deal a number of damage to an actor
    DiscardCardAction
    The action to discard a card from a player
    DiscardRandomCardAction
    The action to discard a random card from a player
    DrawNumCardAction
    The action to draw a number of cards
    GainNumAttackAction
    The action to let the character gain a number of attack
    GainNumDefenseAction
    The action to let the character gain a number of defense
    GainNumMaxHealthAction
    The action to let the character gain a number of maximum health
    HealingAction
    This class implements the Action class and provides an implementation of the Action Healing in the game.
    MageDuplicateAction
    Copy a card from the current player's hand into that hand, triggered by playing the Mage class card "Duplicate".
    MoveNumTilesAction
    The action to move the character forward a number of tiles.
    RestoreNumHealthAction
    The action to let the character restore a number of health.
    RollDiceAction
    The action to roll the dice
    SkipTurnAction
    The action to skip a player's turn
    TrapAction
    This class implements the Action class and provides an implementation of the Action Trap in the game.

Package edu.jhu.cs.pl.group18.CurseOfMalphamondModel.Action Description

This package implements all the actions that a tile can take
Since:
1.2
